black-on-black-edition.Name: Bee (Black on Black Edition)
black-on-black-edition.Body:
Black on Black Edition

This print looks more like porcelain than paper which was my reason for choosing Giclee over screen printing.

I'm delighted with these prints and I hope you like them to. They will be the first of a new collection I'm exploring.

Medium: Giclee Print
Stock: Hernemühle Photo Rag 308g
Size: 55 cm x 55 cm
Limited Edition: 30

The print comes unframed, signed, numbered and embossed with my logo to ensure authenticity.

For framing prices and options please contact me via email.
Unfortunately I am unable to ship frames abroad.

black-on-black-edition.Name: Tipu's Tiger in Jasmine (Black on Black Edition)
black-on-black-edition.Body:
Black on Black Edition

Tipu's Tiger is an eighteenth-century mechanical toy created for Tipu Sultan, the ruler of the Kingdom of Mysore in India. The hand carved wooden toy / musical instrument depicts a ferocious tiger, the emblem of the Tipu Sultan, mauling his enemy a European soldier. 

I've always been fascinated by this, almost life size, classic and it has inspired my latest print. The tiger as seen through the eyes of the soldier seconds before the attack.

You can see Tipu's Tiger at the Victoria & Albert museum in London.

Medium: Giclee Print
Stock: Hernemühle Photo Rag 308g
Size: 55 cm x 55 cm
Limited Edition: 30

The print comes unframed, signed, numbered and embossed with my logo to ensure authenticity.

For framing prices and options please contact me via email.
Unfortunately I am unable to ship frames abroad.

cards.Name: Bee Cards (pack of 6)
cards.Body:
I’ve translated two of my most popular designs into high quality greetings cards that I think you’ll love and certainly not find in any card shop.

Printed on beautiful Callisto Pearl 300g stock these cards are blank inside and come with a white envelope.

Available on the website in packs of 6.

collectable-toys.Name: Petals
collectable-toys.Body:
COMING SCOON

Cast in resin and rubber.

collectable-toys.Name: JED Mk1 - 'SILVERTHUMB'
collectable-toys.Body:
Who Is SILVERTHUMB?
In 2067 JED droids were deployed by the Lunar Mining Corp, to mine the Moon's core. JED Mk1 droids are, primarily, machine operators, saviours and project managers.

This JED unit has a mismatched aluminium thumb. The result of loosing his original thumb in a, some would say, clumsy and totally avoidable Vollyball accident. 

What Is JED Mk1?
JED MK1 is an illuminated, fully articulated cold cast metal sculpture. Cold cast in iron with a light rust dusting, he is fitted with an array if LED lights which offer six selectable light patterns.

Here are his vital statistics:

  • Cold Cast in iron
  • Articulated arms, fingers and head
  • 40 LED lights
  • 6 light patterns to choose from
  • Programmable micro controller
  • Resin flower brain
  • USB power cable
  • Hight = 1 foot (305mm)

Each Sculpture has been given a personality and nick name and this is one is called SILVERTHUMB.

collectable-toys.Name: JED Mk1 - 'EINSTEIN'
collectable-toys.Body:
Who Is EINSTEIN?
In 2067 JED droids were deployed by the Lunar Mining Corp, to mine the Moon's core. JED Mk1 droids are, primarily, machine operators, saviours and project managers.

On account of his very large 'Flower Brain'.
JED droids can swap out their brains depending on the task at hand. After a hard day's work down the Lunar mines, JED units like to unwind by plugging into a 'Flower Brain'.

What Is JED Mk1?
JED MK1 is an illuminated, fully articulated cold cast metal sculpture. Cold cast in iron with a light rust dusting, he is fitted with an array if LED lights which offer six selectable light patterns.

Here are his vital statistics:

  • Cold Cast in iron
  • Articulated arms, fingers and head
  • 40 LED lights
  • 6 light patterns to choose from
  • Programmable micro controller
  • Resin flower brain
  • USB power cable
  • Hight = 1 foot (305mm)

Each Sculpture has been given a personality and nick name and this is EINSTEIN.

collectable-toys.Name: JED Mk1 - 'CRYBABY'
collectable-toys.Body:
Who Is CRYBABY?
In 2067 JED droids were deployed by the Lunar Mining Corp, to mine the Moon's core. JED Mk1 droids are, primarily, machine operators, saviours and project managers.

This JED unit has developed a reoccurring oil leak in his right eye. The other Droids were quick to nick name him CryBaby

What Is JED Mk1?
JED MK1 is an illuminated, fully articulated cold cast metal sculpture. Cold cast in iron with a light rust dusting, he is fitted with an array if LED lights which offer six selectable light patterns.

Each Sculpture has been given a personality and nick name and this is CRYBABY.

collectable-toys.Name: JED Mk1 - 'ROMEO'
collectable-toys.Body:
Who Is ROMEO?
In 2067 JED droids were deployed by the Lunar Mining Corp, to mine the Moon's core. JED Mk1 droids are, primarily, machine operators, saviours and project managers.

Due to casting imperfections at the foundry, this JED unit has a crack close to his nuclear core, his heart, and what looks like a tear in his left eye. He was quickly given the nick name ROMEO.

What Is JED Mk1?
JED MK1 is an illuminated, fully articulated cold cast metal sculpture. Cold cast in iron with a light rust dusting, he is fitted with an array if LED lights which offer six selectable light patterns.

Each Sculpture has been given a personality and nick name and this is ROMEO.

giclee-prints.Name: Tipu's Tiger in Jasmine (Light)
giclee-prints.Body:
Tipu's Tiger is an eighteenth-century mechanical toy created for Tipu Sultan, the ruler of the Kingdom of Mysore in India. The hand carved wooden toy / musical instrument depicts a ferocious tiger, the emblem of the Tipu Sultan, mauling his enemy a European soldier. 

I've always been fascinated by this, almost life size, classic and it has inspired my latest print. The tiger as seen through the eyes of the soldier seconds before the attack.

You can see Tipu's Tiger at the Victoria & Albert museum in London.

Medium: Giclee Print
Stock: Hernemühle Photo Rag 308g
Size: 55 cm x 55 cm
Limited Edition: 30

The print comes unframed, signed, numbered and embossed with my logo to ensure authenticity.

For framing prices and options please contact me via email.
Unfortunately I am unable to ship frames abroad.

jed-mk1.Name: JED Mk1 - 'RUSTY'
jed-mk1.Body:
Who Is RUSTY?
In 2067 JED droids were deployed by the Lunar Mining Corp, to mine the Moon's core. JED Mk1 droids are, primarily, machine operators, saviours and project managers.

Having spent, arguably too many hours in the damp bars and clubs of 'Mare Nubium', this JED droid has developed a chronic case of rusting.

What Is JED Mk1?
JED MK1 is an illuminated, fully articulated cold cast metal sculpture. Cold cast in iron with a light rust dusting, he is fitted with an array if LED lights which offer six selectable light patterns.

Here are his vital statistics:

  • Cold Cast in iron
  • Articulated arms, fingers and head
  • 40 LED lights
  • 6 light patterns to choose from
  • Programmable micro controller
  • Resin flower brain
  • USB power cable
  • Hight = 1 foot (305mm)

Each Sculpture has been given a personality and nick name and this is RUSTY.

jed-mk1.Name: JED Mk1 - 'SILVERTHUMB'
jed-mk1.Body:

screen-prints.Name: Bee (large)
screen-prints.Body:
This is a seven colour hand pulled screen print version of the smaller digital Giclee print.
This special version is printed in rich gold and pearlised inks so when hung in a well lit room this print has a subtle iridescent quality.

Stock: Sumerset TUB 400g
Size: 86 cm x 86 cm
Limited Edition: 20

The print comes unframed, signed, numbered and embossed with my logo to ensure authenticity.

For framing prices and options please contact me via email.
Unfortunately I am unable to ship frames abroad.

screen-prints.Name: Blue Bird (large)
screen-prints.Body:

screen-prints.Name: A Fox and a Bird (Large)
screen-prints.Body:
It was this print that won me the award for ‘Best International Artist’ by the Global Artist Agency in 2014. Inspired by the wildlife at the end of my garden this print tells the story of desire and longing.

This hand pulled screen print is in copper, rich and pale gold ink.
When hung in a well lit room this print has a subtle iridescent quality.

Stock: Fabriano 5 Hot Press
Size: 86 cm x 86 cm
Limited Edition: 50

The print comes unframed, signed, numbered and embossed with my logo to ensure authenticity.

screen-prints.Name: Dreaming Of Fish (large)
screen-prints.Body:
"Sometimes I find myself gazing at the print and it's like looking into a mirror. There's a little of that bear in us all." Sarah Crouch

This is a hand pulled screen print in pale and rich gold ink. When hung in a well lit room this print has a subtle iridescent quality.

screen-prints.Name: Black Diamond Bear
screen-prints.Body:
This is the first time I've used diamond dust in my work and I'm so excited by the results.

I've also had the black ink UV cured which adds a further dimension to what is already a stunning thing.

Size: 80 cm x 80 cm 
Limited Edition: 20

screen-prints.Name: Bear In A Boat (large)
screen-prints.Body:

This hand pulled screen print is in rich and pale gold ink.
